articles.title: Low-cost airline easyJet has struggled while rival Wizz Air flourished - The Times
articles.description: Amid the flurry of interest that followed news of Wizz Air’s tilt at easyJet, nobody will have been following the story more closely than the respective companies’ shareholders. While Wizz Air’s stock has taken off with the reopening of European travel, share…

articles.title: State in running for new multibillion Intel investment - The Irish Times
articles.description: Tech giant planning to invest up to $80bn in Europe over next decade
articles.content:
The Republic is in the running to land a major new multibillion-dollar Intel investment, the tech giants chief executive Pat Gelsinger has said.

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: 'Mu' Covid variant potentially of concern, EU agency says - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency said Thursday a coronavirus variant known as "Mu" could be cause for concern, although there is no data yet to show it will overtake the dominant Delta strain.
articles.content:
